titleStmt.title: The surueyors dialogue Diuided into fiue bookes: very profitable for all men to peruse, that haue to do with the reuenues of land, or the manurance, vse, or occupation thereof, both lords and tenants: as also and especially for such as indeuor to be seene in the faculty of surueying of mannors, lands, tenements, &c. By I.N.
titleStmt.author: Norden, John, 1548-1625?

titleStmt.title: The surueyors dialogue Diuided into fiue bookes: very profitable for all men to peruse, that haue to do with the reuenues of land, or the manurance, vse, or occupation thereof, both lords and tenants: as also and especially for such as indeuor to be seene in the faculty of surueying of mannors, lands, tenements, &c. By I.N.
titleStmt.author: Norden, John, 1548-1625?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Simon Stafford] for Hugh Astley, dwelling at S. Magnus corner,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A"; the last two leaves are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
